# f5distributedcloud_virtual_network (Resource)

The `f5distributedcloud_virtual_network` resource manages Virtual Networks in F5 Distributed Cloud.

Virtual Networks provide isolated network environments for workloads.

## Example Usage

```hcl
resource "f5distributedcloud_virtual_network" "example" {
  name        = "my-vnet"
  namespace   = "system"
  description = "Virtual network for application isolation"
}
```



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String)
- `namespace` (String)

### Optional

- `description` (String)

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
